simts
  • Time Series Models

  • Reference

Add Space to Avoid Duplicate Elements

Add space to every element if there are duplicates in the vector.

addSpaceIfDuplicate(x)

Arguments

x

A character vector

Examples

##no duplicate
x1 = c('simts2', 'simts1', 'simts3')
addSpaceIfDuplicate(x1)
#> [1] "simts2" "simts1" "simts3"

##duplicate
x2 = c('simts3', 'simts4', 'simts3', 'simts4', 'simts5', 'simts6','simts3')
addSpaceIfDuplicate(x2)
#> [1] "simts3"   "simts4"   "simts3 "  "simts4 "  "simts5"   "simts6"   "simts3  "

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples
